DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional retrospective chart review study aim evaluate clinical outcome patient RRMM receive lenalidomide/dexamethasone ( Len/Dex ) treatment 1st relapse treatment pattern follow progressive disease part routine clinical practice Greece .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Chart Review Study Outcomes 2nd Line Therapy With LEn/Dex Greek Patients With R/R Multiple MyEloma Treatment PatterNs Following Progressive Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjects must fulfill ALL follow criterion : Subjects gender , age 18 year old Subjects must relapse refractory MM diagnosis accord IMWG EBMT criterion Subjects must initiate secondline therapy lenalidomide/dexamethasone accord approve product ' Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC ) 01 January 2009 01 March 2014 Subjects must available medical files/records detail historical data disease course clinical management Provision sign ICF collect analyze medical data pertinent objective study For candidate subject NONE follow criterion apply : Prior malignancy ( within 3 year precede initial diagnosis MM ) Concurrent administration anticancer regimens malignancy MM time initial MM diagnosis time second relapse Subject participation interventional study
